mapper.insert: insert into news_summary ( member_id, source_name, source_url, title, published_at, summary_text, detail_summary, analysis_json, keywords_json ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{sourceName}, #{sourceUrl}, #{title}, #{publishedAt}, #{summaryText}, #{detailSummary}, CAST(#{analysisJson} AS JSONB), CAST(#{keywordsJson} AS JSONB) )
mapper.select: select summary_id, member_id, source_name, source_url, title, published_at, summary_text, detail_summary, analysis_json, keywords_json, created_at from news_summary where summary_id = #{summaryId}

select summary_id, member_id, source_name, source_url, title, published_at, summary_text, detail_summary, analysis_json, keywords_json, created_at from news_summary where source_url = #{sourceUrl} LIMIT 1

select summary_id, member_id, source_name, source_url, title, published_at, summary_text, detail_summary, analysis_json, keywords_json, created_at from news_summary where member_id = #{memberId} order by created_at DESC limit #{limit}

select summary_id, member_id, title, source_name, source_url, published_at, summary_text, detail_summary, analysis_json, keywords_json, created_at
from news_summary where member_id = #{memberId} AND DATE(created_at) = #{date} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

select summary_id, member_id, source_name, source_url, title, published_at, summary_text, detail_summary, analysis_json, keywords_json, created_at from news_summary where 1=1
AND (
title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR summary_text LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CAST(keywords_json AS TEXT) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
)
AND DATE(published_at) = CURRENT_DATE
AND published_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
AND published_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month'
order by published_at DESC, created_at DESC limit #{limit}
